summary: The test/utils package provides shared testing infrastructure for Qiskit Terra, including tools to convert circuit components into a deterministic canonical form for reliable comparisons, a hierarchy of base test case classes that handle environment setup, circuit equality checks, and parallel execution defaults, and a set of decorators that enable call tracking, enforcement of expected method usage, automatic method wrapping, and optional marking of slow tests.
business_intent: Enable consistent, accurate, and maintainable unit testing of Qiskit Terra by offering reusable utilities that standardize circuit representation, test case configuration, and test behavior management, thereby reducing flaky tests and improving developer productivity.
